meanings.definition: The position or rank of a professor.
meanings.sent1: Many aspire to attain prestigious professorships at renowned universities.
meanings.sent2: The university offers several professorships in various fields of study.
meanings.sent3: The competition for professorships was fierce, with candidates showcasing their expertise.
meanings.sent4: In the academic world, professorships are like crowns of knowledge and authority.
meanings.sent5: The professorships gleamed with promise and opportunity for those seeking to educate.

meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a professor.
meanings.sent1: Professorships involve teaching, research, and mentoring students.
meanings.sent2: Balancing multiple professorships can be challenging for educators.
meanings.sent3: The professorships piled up on the desk, waiting to be fulfilled with dedication.
meanings.sent4: Juggling various professorships requires organizational skills and time management.
meanings.sent5: The weight of professorships rested on the shoulders of the dedicated faculty members.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a professor.
meanings.sent1: His professorship lasted for over three decades before retirement.
meanings.sent2: The professorship of the esteemed scholar will soon come to an end.
meanings.sent3: The professorship clock ticked away the days until the next academic year.
meanings.sent4: Passing on the professorship to a new generation symbolizes continuity in academia.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of his professorship echoed through the halls of the university.
